Row.Text: Your building [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]{1_BuildingName:textkey}[ENDCOLOR] in your city {2_CityName:textkey} went out of resource [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]{3_ResourceName:textkey}[ENDCOLOR]![NEWLINE]It was removed from your city, but you can build it for free again as soon as you have {3_ResourceName:textkey} again.

Euer Gebäude [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]{1_BuildingName:textkey}[ENDCOLOR] in Eurer Stadt {2_CityName:textkey} hat kein [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]{3_ResourceName:textkey}[ENDCOLOR] mehr![NEWLINE]Es wurde aus Eurer Stadt entfernt, aber Ihr könnt es kostenlos erneut bauen, sobald Ihr wieder {3_ResourceName:textkey} habt.
